activity_differential: people shopping and walking in a busy street market
people navigating through traffic and stalls
people carrying bags and interacting with market goods
description: A bustling street market scene at night with multiple people walking, shopping, and interacting, as well as motorcycles and an auto rickshaw moving through the area. The camera moves forward, panning and tracking the flow of people and vehicles.

relationship_filter_metadata.explanation: The dress is below the person, not the other way around; flipping subject and object makes the spatial relation 'below' correct.
relationship_filter_metadata.label: flipped
